website_summaries.verdict: These tough boots are well-made and designed to hold up to wintry conditions, but others we considered offer similar warmth and wear for lower prices.
pros: Removable liners make these boots versatile for various temperatures and conditions
Built to last with a synthetic/leather upper and grippy rubber sole
Available in styles for boys and girls
cons: A bit difficult to put on
Heavier and pricier than others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Best boots for lil' ones!
customer_reviews.text: These kids boots are awesome! I bought the size 4 pink toddler boots and they even have the original removable, PINK, liners! We are a family that has been enjoying sorel boots for years and these are no exception. My kids always complain about having cold feet during the winter but never while wearing these sorel boots. Love the 1964 sorel PAC strap boots. The size 4 toddler boot is 5-1/2" long to help with sizing. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B.Sativa24

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this boot, and happy I ordered a size 10 when my toddler is really an 8, going on 9. However, she finds the boot very uncomfortable. It really doesn't have any give and hurts the top of her foot. The length and width are fine. It's really just the part that is just below the straps that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H.

customer_reviews.title: The best winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so much better in person! Fit is perfect, they are very well made and my daughter absolutely loves them! They are waterproof and rated for -25o. We live in Alaska so good boots are a must. These are hands down our go to winter boots. Our entire family has sorels.
customer_reviews.author: Mother in the north.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and they fit perfectly. We purchased a different version of sorel boots and ended up having to return them because they were too tight on my daughters ankles. She loves these however and so do I. Excellent quality, durable, really cute, and comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow. Won’t go on feet
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old wears a size 7 so I bought size 8. Her bare foot can’t even fit in them. So narrow 😕 I love the way they look but they don’t go in her feet and she doesn’t have fat feet. It’s too bad. She was almost crying as we tried putting them on so we have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: M Dorm

customer_reviews.title: Just okay for me
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice boots, but also very difficult to fully get on my toddlers foot. Found myself sweating as we were getting dressed to go play in the snow just trying to get her foot in! Then she didn't want to walk in them (I think they're stiff). Kind of pricey product and not super impressed
customer_reviews.author: K. Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. Second time buying a new size. Very durable. Stay in great shape. Still looks brand new second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots they are made so I know my granddaughter's feet will be warm and dry. She loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our toddler and will be purchasing in every size so all of our kids will have great quality boots every winter.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best Children's Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots were used in our Canadian winter and during a thaw - they were sturdy, completely waterproof and the liners pull out and dry very quickly if they get sweaty. My granddaughter loves them so I am buying another pair for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Careless packaging
customer_reviews.text: These sores are amazing because I have used them before. However the sender sent a size 12 instead of a 13 and without paying attention I threw away the box when I received them. Now I am stuck with a show that doesn’t fit my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Fit is too small
customer_reviews.text: Adorable boots but the inside is so narrow! My boys actually wear a size smaller than I bought the boots and I could not fit their little feet in them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Osborne

customer_reviews.title: these are really cute, high quality boots but beware ...
customer_reviews.text: these are really cute, high quality boots but beware, they run very very narrow. i couldn't get my son's foot in even though i ordered big for him to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot that didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Adorable boots but it was just too hard to get my daughters’s rather wide foot down into the boot. May be better when she’s able to help push her own heal down a little more. Would still recommend because high quality and soooo cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jasinski

customer_reviews.title: Very cute size is great. Was concerned they would be to tall for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute size is great. Was concerned they would be to tall for my 2yr old grandchild but nothing to be concerned about. We live where it can go to -35 so warmth is nessasary. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Which is great since her mantra is "I don't need help"
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler LOVES her boots. My 4yr old can put the boots on and take them off all by herself. Which is great since her mantra is "I don't need help". She has worn them around the house and cant wait for winter. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Joi Sabrina Fields

customer_reviews.title: comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Really love these boots for my 2 year old. She is very comfortable in them and likes to wear them. I ordered one size larger and they fit good. The liner is very thick and warm. I like that they can be removed for warmer days.
customer_reviews.author: OHIO

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Put A Price On Warm Feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!! I ordered a size 10 pair for my 4 year old and a size 6 pair for my 2 year old. Both my girls have narrow feet to I expected these boots to be a bit on the larger size. They love them! Great for our snowy Northern Idaho winters! Nobody complains they have cold feet!! Good deal on amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved these boots but I could not get them On ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots but I could not get them On my sons feet so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these bots and he says they are so warm.
customer_reviews.author: alan hunt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the snow, waterproof and very easy to put on for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mershon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get your child's foot into this boot -- I ended up returning them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable. My daughter and I have matching ones
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. My daughter and I have matching ones, and she loves them. She tries to sneak and wear them to school, I have to constantly remind her when it snows!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda theresa

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I expected. Very pleased. Warm and comfy. Easy for my two year old to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Wife and Mommy of 5

customer_reviews.title: but easily returned, and reordered larger size
customer_reviews.text: They were too small, but easily returned, and reordered larger size.
customer_reviews.author: RNSpeare

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend from both my 3 year old and I
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest winter boots I've ever bought for my kids! Highly recommend from both my 3 year old and I!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Petras

customer_reviews.title: Awsome mom
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better to keep my three year old’s toe warm!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Warm, comfortable and beautiful. My daughter just adores them
customer_reviews.author: Antonina Kapralova

customer_reviews.title: I do like it but don’t fit right
customer_reviews.text: They to hart by the ankle fot the child to put it on !
customer_reviews.author: Erwin217

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots on my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots on my 3 year old. She is size 7 and her feet just slide right in
customer_reviews.author: anastasia orechkevitch

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Loves these! They are so cute and fit my little guy perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability and how warm her feet stay. Easier to get on and Velcro stays on
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jaremba

customer_reviews.title: Great boots but too heavy for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute and made of very good quality. However, they too heavy for my 2.6 yrs old toddler and she's strugglinf to walk in them. I will be returning this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot. Warm and Waterproof. Easy on and off . Great traction.Durable
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put om
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm, but extremely difficult to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Toddler boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is a bit too bulky for a toddler boot, but other than that it has all the greatness you expect from a sorel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BOOTS!! They are the most adorable boots I have ever seen my daughter wear and she loves them too. Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Sturdy, comfy and keeps the little toes warm.
customer_reviews.author: Edite Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect boot for my 5 year old in cold and/or rainy weather!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Please clean up well if selling a return product
customer_reviews.text: Boots is good, fit very well and looks warm but looks like the seller shipped a used or return product. The dirt under the sole is visible.
customer_reviews.author: John Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. Sorel makes a great boot and delivery was quick as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garman

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for the snow
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves them. They are perfect for the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots they fit well go on easy and so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots they fit well go on easy and so far seem to keep his feet warm (no real snow fall yet)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Looks amazing. Arrived as it was scheduled on time. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The inside is quite tight but, I stretched them ...
customer_reviews.text: The inside is quite tight but, I stretched them with a coffee mug over night and it fit right the following day. My son did not wear them too long about an hour or so but thats only because thats all the time we had, not sure how long it can be worn for.
customer_reviews.author: Hovannes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son says these boots are very comfortable, and I've seen him run and play easily in them with no complaints. They keep his feet warm and dry, and the velcro makes them super easy for him to get on and off. I also like that they look pretty unisex, so my younger daughter will be able to wear them too, if they hold up. When he first saw them, my son asked if they were girls' boots because of the fur, but he's gotten over that since then. I think they look adorable and not overly girly at all. They seem to be worth the price so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kearin

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so cute but I'm only giving 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute but I'm only giving 2 stars because they are impossible to get on my kid's feet. I literally cannot get her foot in. I know if I could get them on they would fit her because I got a size up from what she normally wears but the boot opening is just really tight for toddler feet. I'm going to try to stretch them out & give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey4020

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots a size up (toddler's 4) to accommodate thicker socks, but could not get my son's bare foot into the shoe. The tongue doesn't pull down all the way making it impossible to know when the shoe is on correctly until they try to walk. Proportions were way off also... Had my son (who has comically small feet for his age) got his foot into this shoe, the top would have fallen just below the knee. My first reaction was- these are so cute but too big (wrong!) and there was no flex in the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sorel - the one and only
customer_reviews.text: The best boots PERIOD! Wish I could have got the same deal for my other daughter
customer_reviews.author: apkesler

product_meta.title: Sorel 1964 Pac Strap-K Snow Boot
product_meta.description: A classic Sorel silhouette updated with two velcro straps for easy on and off. This functional pac boot is ideal for any use from playing in the snow to après ski. A warm, waterproof boot with a removable liner.
feature_bullets: Snow boot featuring seam-sealed waterproof upper with two hook-and-loop straps and sherpa cuff
Handcrafted vulcanized rubber with herringbone outsole
